entity1.name: Zombie Apocalypse
entity1.description: A hypothetical scenario where a widespread outbreak of zombies occurs, threatening human civilization.;;;A hypothetical scenario where a widespread outbreak of zombies occurs, threatening human survival.;;;A scenario where zombies, typically reanimated corpses or mindless human-like beings, overrun an area causing widespread panic and survival challenges.;;;A hypothetical scenario where a widespread outbreak of zombies leads to the collapse of society and civilization.;;;A hypothetical situation where a widespread disaster leads to the rise of zombies, threatening human survival.;;;A hypothetical scenario where a widespread outbreak of zombies leads to societal collapse and the struggle for human survival.
